_header: Jewels precious can I none find to sell
_description: A Greeting on New Years’ Morning — four stanzas rhyme royal and concluding couplet

Lam306.First Lines:
Iuellis pricious cane y non fynde to selleto sende you my Souerein
                    þis newe yeres morowe…
Lam306.Last Lines:
…So that y yeue ones be yeve for euermorefor this hath loue
                    and trouth y lerned me þe lore
Lam306.Attributed Title:
Euermore without chaung for euer / til body and soule part and disseuere
                    (f. 136v)
Lam306.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
